DOC.brief_summary: Recent evidence show young people want child low fertility knowledge . This study evaluate efficacy video intervention fertility knowledge , change lifestyle decision start get pregnant .
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare efficacy video intervention versus control ( video ) couple intend child next three year . The couple randomize two group . The video contain information concern age-related fertility decline , fertility risk factor , success infertility treatment , emotional consequence childlessness .
DOC.criteria: Female member couple 24 40 year Childless couple try conceive couple desire child next 3 year Relationship length minimum one year Couples already achieve successful pregnancy Couples child
